channel.title: Lose items on death in certain areas
channel.description: I was wondering how i can lose items on death when i do ::bh and die there, i dont lose items and i dont know how to make it so, its a 508 server with palidino coding, i cannt find a death method so dont say that, or if i do tell me where to find it please.
